name: template

metadata.description:
template Sensor


In case you want to use actuators such as e-mail, you might wish to create an HTML based content. This sensor can used to create such a template, where we use {{ }} notation. For example if you want to specify the resource name in the template and the resource is set at node level, use {{META.$.name}}. If you want to access other resource metadata property in template, use {{ META.$. }} The task id can be accessed using {{TASK_ID}}

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed

Raw Data
  • result (only returned on Success state)

Properties
  • template: Text to template
